titles.title: I Love You, Lord, Just Because Of Who You Are

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I love You, Lord, just because of Who You are;
You are the Prince of peace,
The bright and morning star.
You rule and reign over all the universe
In glory, power and might,
I love You, Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love You, Lord, Lord of lords and King of kings,
Who was and is to come,
You make my heart to sing;
Almighty God, Who desires to form and fill
And dwell within my heart,
I love You, Lord!
